channel.title: (508)pro pkzscape(pking/spawing source)
channel.description:
FULL BOUNTY HUNTER: Working Warning Screen upon entry Non-Wildy outside of Bounty Hunter Fully working targets, finds a player closest to your level as a target because we only have high crater Fully Working penalties, Can't leave and Pickup penalities are 100%! Unable to log out, tele, commands, or teletabs while having a penalty Fully working Bounty Hunter Skulls, Skulls are based on what the Player is carrying/wearing. Coins do not count as wealth Fully working Bounty Locate, Requirement lvl, rune deletion, and teles to your target Player drops all items in Bounty Hunter The best PvP system Fully working Trading(all does not work though but use 'x' for now) Fully working bank noting Full teleblock system Fully working wilderness levels Fully working 1v1 Fully working Multi areas Multi-Barrage Mage Bonus applys PK points requirements for untradeables(Fire Capes, Gloves, Void, Torso, Defenders, Etc.) ::item (id) (amount) for items, items cost money ::sellitem (id) (amount) for items Untradeable items Clan Chat All Barrows Effects(except for Karils and Ahrims) All Void effects Vesta Special and Degrades Vesta, Dragon Plate, Dragon Full Helm, Dragon Claws, All Spirit Shields!
Getting Started: You will start off in Edgeville(non-wildy). You are started off with 6M Spending XP. To use some of the XP, just do ::level lvlid XP. Level ID's are: 0 - Attack 1 - Defence 3 - HitPoints 4 - Range 5 - Prayer 6 - Magic Once you are done with that, do ::starter and you will recieve a book along with 999k. Use it wisely and read the book for some tips. Teleport to ::pvp to fight players, PvP atm is the only way for training.
pics
source link-http://uppit.com/v/S6WRFF6N\
sorry didnt make cleint...

item.title: (508)pro pkzscape(pking/spawing source)
item.dc:creator: @united_pkzz united pkzz
item.description:
@united_pkzz wrote:

FULL BOUNTY HUNTER:
Working Warning Screen upon entry
Non-Wildy outside of Bounty Hunter
Fully working targets, finds a player closest to your level as a target because we only have high crater
Fully Working penalties, Can’t leave and Pickup penalities are 100%! Unable to log out, tele, commands, or teletabs while having a penalty
Fully working Bounty Hunter Skulls, Skulls are based on what the Player is carrying/wearing. Coins do not count as wealth
Fully working Bounty Locate, Requirement lvl, rune deletion, and teles to your target
Player drops all items in Bounty Hunter
The best PvP system
Fully working Trading(all does not work though but use ‘x’ for now)
Fully working bank noting
Full teleblock system
Fully working wilderness levels
Fully working 1v1
Fully working Multi areas
Multi-Barrage
Mage Bonus applys
PK points requirements for untradeables(Fire Capes, Gloves, Void, Torso, Defenders, Etc.)
::item (id) (amount) for items, items cost money
::sellitem (id) (amount) for items
Untradeable items
Clan Chat
All Barrows Effects(except for Karils and Ahrims)
All Void effects
Vesta Special and Degrades
Vesta, Dragon Plate, Dragon Full Helm, Dragon Claws, All Spirit Shields!

Getting Started:
You will start off in Edgeville(non-wildy). You are started off with 6M Spending XP. To use some of the XP, just do ::level lvlid XP. Level ID’s are:
0 - Attack
1 - Defence
3 - HitPoints
4 - Range
5 - Prayer
6 - Magic
Once you are done with that, do ::starter and you will recieve a book along with 999k. Use it wisely and read the book for some tips. Teleport to ::pvp to fight players, PvP atm is the only way for training.
